response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and efficiency. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. For this opportunity, I am proposing a price of $15,000. I look forward to discussing how this product can significantly enhance your operations or personal needs.", "product_price": 15000}
